title: If GOP Wins Either House Of Congress, Dems Must Kill the Debt Ceiling
dc:creator: Barkley Rosser
description:
If GOP Wins Either House Of Congress, Dems Must Kill Debt Ceiling Â If it comes to pass and especially if the GOP takes both houses, presumably Democrats will be able to kill the debt ceiling in the lame duck session. This assumes Manchin and Sinema stick with them on it, which one of them might […]
